name: Mission Lynx
description:
This is the best game that I have made so far ! It's my fourth entry for #1GAM with the theme: Resolution. The game starts at 400x800 and the height shrinks down as you play and it gets more difficult. (It's cool :D)

v1.0: Release version

v1.1: Added arrow keys controls

Controls: A, D or Left and Right keys to move sideways, M to mute

Music: Hydraulistic, by Djjaner (http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/601212)

Review: http://www.fastpacedreviews.com/2015/01/mission-ly...

Tweet me your highscore at: https://twitter.com/_smallphil (please give me feedback or comments (espicially on the difficulty))

SmallPhil <3
